response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of grasping the saucepot from the stove. The robot now has both the carrot and the saucepot in its inventory. The next step is to put the carrot into the saucepot.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the carrot from the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the stove.
(6) Grasp the saucepot from the stove.
(7) Put the carrot into the saucepot.
(8) Put the saucepot back onto the stove.
(9) Turn on the stove to cook the carrot.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Put the carrot into the saucepot
    carrot = registry(env,"carrot_151")
    saucepot = registry(env,"saucepot_150")
    put_inside(robot, carrot, saucepot)
    donothing(env)
